Package stream.tcp

Class EchoServerMultiThreaded

java.lang.Object
stream.tcp.EchoServerMultiThreaded
public class EchoServerMultiThreaded
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the server which makes communication between multiple clients possible

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    EchoServerMultiThreaded​(int port)
    The constructor takes care of several tasks: The server listens on a socket if a new client wants to start a connection.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void closeThread​(ClientThread client)
    Method to close a given client thread.
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  
    void sendList​(java.util.UUID to)
    Method to send a list of connected clients to a specific client
    void sendPrivateMsg​(java.lang.String from, java.lang.String to, java.lang.String line)
    The method takes a message (or information in general) passed as a String, and sends it to a specific client if connected.
    void sendToAll​(java.lang.String line)
    The method takes a message (or information in general) passed as a String, saves it the chat history and sends it to all connected clients.
    void sendToAllExcept​(java.lang.String line, java.util.UUID id)
    The method takes a message (or information in general) passed as a String, saves it the chat history and sends it to all connected clients except a specific client given by his uuid.
    java.lang.String whatTimeItIs()
    This method finds out the date and time.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • EchoServerMultiThreaded

      public EchoServerMultiThreaded​(int port)
      The constructor takes care of several tasks: The server listens on a socket if a new client wants to start a connection. All connected clients are saved in a HashMap. For every client a new thread is started.
      Parameters:
      port - the port to listen to

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

    • whatTimeItIs

      public java.lang.String whatTimeItIs()
      This method finds out the date and time.
      Returns:
      ret Current date and time represented as a String.

    • sendToAll

      public void sendToAll​(java.lang.String line)
      The method takes a message (or information in general) passed as a String, saves it the chat history and sends it to all connected clients.
      Parameters:
      line - A message or information.

    • sendPrivateMsg

      public void sendPrivateMsg​(java.lang.String from, java.lang.String to, java.lang.String line)
      The method takes a message (or information in general) passed as a String, and sends it to a specific client if connected.
      Parameters:
      from - user name of sender
      to - user name of recipient
      line - the message to be transfered

    • sendList

      public void sendList​(java.util.UUID to)
      Method to send a list of connected clients to a specific client
      Parameters:
      to - unique user id of a client thread

    • sendToAllExcept

      public void sendToAllExcept​(java.lang.String line, java.util.UUID id)
      The method takes a message (or information in general) passed as a String, saves it the chat history and sends it to all connected clients except a specific client given by his uuid.
      Parameters:
      line - A message or information
      id - The unique user id of a client thread

    • closeThread

      public void closeThread​(ClientThread client)
      Method to close a given client thread.
      Parameters:
      client - The client to be stopped.
